```pddl
[
  '(:action boil
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - resource ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (has_stove ?location))
    :effect (and (boiled ?resource) (not (cold ?resource)))',
    
  '(:action add
    :parameters (?p - agent ?l - location ?item - object ?container - object ?condition - predicate)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (not (added ?item ?container)) ?condition)
    :effect (and (added ?item ?container)))',
    
  '(:action drain
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - resource ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (processed ?entity))
    :effect (and (drained ?entity) (not (wet ?entity)))',
    
  '(:action cook
    :parameters (?p - agent ?l - location ?item - object ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (prepared ?tool))
    :effect (cooked ?item))',
    
  '(:action serve
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object ?location - location ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (cooked ?container))
    :effect (served ?item ?container))'
]
```
